strapiPost.title: Roll On
strapiPost.content:
Today is the last day to get on in on this weekend's Square 2 Square ride. In the face of the Covid-19 pandemic, last year's ride was held virtually. This year there are both virtual and in person options. Here's the skinny...

  • The virtual participation ride will be held May 2 - May 31. Riders can pick up their finisher medals at these locations.
  • The in person options will be held this Saturday, May 1. Riders have the option to start either from the south or the north and can do 15 or 30 mile routes.
  • Both rides are meant to get new riders involved and help them feel confident in taking on the Greenway on their own.

If you're interested in participating in either option, go sign up today, so you don't miss out on this fun ride.
